Foreshadow 5–{B}{R}{G} [i](If you cast this spell for its foreshadow cost, it enters with five time counters on it. Until the last is removed, it’s an artifact and not a creature. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter from it.)[/i]
At the beginning of your upkeep, create a tapped 1/1 black Skeleton creature token.
